data.name: AccountError
data.value: Issuer account data invalid, please contact support.

data.name: AuthenticationError
data.value: Login failed. Check your API credentials.

data.name: AvsError
data.value: Address Verification failed.

data.name: BinBlacklistError
data.value: BIN blacklisted.

data.name: BinCountryCheckError
data.value: Card bin does not match billing country

data.name: BlacklistError
data.value: Value from payment transaction or risk params is blacklisted.

data.name: CardBlacklistError
data.value: Card is blacklisted

data.name: CardLimitExceededError
data.value: Card limit exceeded configured limits.

data.name: CardTicketSizeExceededError
data.value: Ticketsize by unknown card exceeded!

data.name: CardVelocityExceededError
data.value: Velocity by unknown card exceeded!

data.name: CardWhitelistError
data.value: PAN Whitelist Filter blocked the transaction. This filter - like the above one - uses the PAN blacklist (BL) to perform CC number checks against the BL in the DB. This filter however will reject transactions from a CC with a number which is not whitelisted.

data.name: ChargebackNotFoundError
data.value: DOCUMENTATION MISSING

data.name: CommunicationError
data.value: Communication with issuer failed, please contact sup- port.

data.name: ConfigurationError
data.value: Configuration error occured, e.g. terminal not config- ured properly. Check terminal settings.

data.name: ConnectionError
data.value: Connection to issuer could not be established, please contact support.

data.name: ContractLimitExceededError
data.value: MID limits exceeded.

data.name: CountryBlacklistError
data.value: Country blacklisted.

data.name: CreditExceededError
data.value: Amount excceds credit card limit.

data.name: CSDetectionError
data.value: The CrossSellingFilter blocks duplicated transactions when an approved transaction has been found on an- other mid. That is, if the transaction has already been processed successfully on a di↵erent mid and within the specified time frame, context entity / scope and possibly within the issuer scope (or not), it will be rejected in order to prevent duplicates.

data.name: DoubletTransactionError
data.value: Transaction doublet was detected, transaction was blocked. This happens if several transactions with same amount, card holder, cc number, cvv and expiry date are sent within 5 minutes.

data.name: ExpiredCardError
data.value: Transaction declined, expiration date not in the future or date invalid.

data.name: InputDataError
data.value: Invalid were data sent to the API.

data.name: InputDataFormatError
data.value: Argument passed in invalid format. Check parame- ters.

data.name: InputDataInvalidError
data.value: Argument passed in valid format but makes no sense (e.g. incorrect country code or currency). Check pa- rameters.

data.name: InputDataMissingError
data.value: Required argument is missing. Check parameters.

data.name: InvalidCardError
data.value: Transaction declined, Credit card number is invalid.

data.name: InvalidContentTypeError
data.value: DOCUMENTATION MISSING

data.name: InvalidTransactionTypeError
data.value: Invalid transaction type was passed to API.

data.name: InvalidXmlError
data.value: The input XML could not be parsed due to invalid code. Please check XML data.

data.name: IpBlacklistError
data.value: IP address blacklisted.

data.name: MaintenanceError
data.value: System is undergoing maintenance, request could not be handled.

data.name: MaxMindRiskError
data.value: If a transaction is considered high risk by MaxMind minFraud service, a MaxMindRiskError is raised.

data.name: MultipleFailureDetectionError
data.value: Found user transaction declined by issuer. Try again later!

data.name: ParsingError
data.value: Issuer response could not be parsed - please reconcile and contact support.

data.name: ProcessingError
data.value: Transaction declined by issuer

data.name: RecurringLimitExceededError
data.value: Amount/count by recurring subscription exceeded.

data.name: ReferenceInvalidatedError
data.value: Reference transaction already invalidated!

data.name: ReferenceMismatchError
data.value: Data mismatch with reference, e.g. amount exceeds reference

data.name: ReferenceNotFoundError
data.value: Reference transaction was not found.

data.name: ReferenceWorkflowError
data.value: Wrong Workflow specified.

data.name: RemoteConfigurationError
data.value: Issuer configuration error

data.name: RemoteConnectionError
data.value: Issuer could not reach clearing network

data.name: RemoteDataError
data.value: Some passed data caused an error on the issuer

data.name: RemoteError
data.value: Some error occured on the issuer. Contact support.

data.name: RemoteSystemError
data.value: Some error occured on the issuer

data.name: RemoteTimeoutError
data.value: Issuer has timeouted with clearing network

data.name: RemoteWorkflowError
data.value: Remote workflow error

data.name: ResponseError
data.value: Issuer returned invalid response - please reconcile and contact support

data.name: RetrievalRequestNotFoundError
data.value: DOCUMENTATION MISSING

data.name: RiskError
data.value: Transaction declined by risk management

data.name: SystemError
data.value: A general system error occured

data.name: TerminalLimitExceededError
data.value: Terminal limits exceeded.

data.name: ThreatMetrixRiskError
data.value: Transaction declined by ThreatMetrix risk module.

data.name: TimeoutError
data.value: Issuer does not respond within given timeframe - please reconcile

data.name: TransactionNotFoundError
data.value: The referenced transaction could not be found.

data.name: TransactionPendingError
data.value: Transaction pending.

data.name: UserLimitExceededError
data.value: User limit exceeded configured limits.

data.name: WorkflowError
data.value: A transaction was triggered that is not possible at this time in the workflow, e.g. a refund on a declined transaction.

data.name: UndefinedError
data.value: Undefined error.
